channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HBASE-17318] Increment does not add new column if the increment amount is zero at first time writing
item.description:
When the data written for the first time is 0, no new columns are added.

Iterate the input columns and update existing values if they were found, otherwise add new column initialized to the increment amount.

Does not add new column if the increment amount is zero at first time writting.

It is necessary to add a new column at the first write to 0.
If not, the result of using the phoenix is NULL.
item.summary: Increment does not add new column if the increment amount is zero at first time writing

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
Can you add a unit test to prevent regression ?

Please attach patch for master branch.
